title: P4sspl01t Ethical Security Tool
description_short: A password-security suite for generation, cracking, breach detection, and entropy analysis.
description_long: A hybrid offensive and defensive password security tool developed across several structured weekly workshops. Features include password generation, targeted brute-force attempts, dictionary-based cracking, basic breach detection logic, entropy scoring, and defensive recommendations. Built collaboratively using version control, structured sprints, and safe cyber-practice principles.

title: Game Off 2025: RE & Security Collaboration
description_short: Joint society project: CompSci teams build games; Cybersoc analyses and reverse engineers them.
description_long: A multi-society collaboration for Itch.io’s Game Off 2025. While Computer Science and Data Science teams create the game builds, Cybersoc focuses on security analysis: debugging binaries, inspecting unsafe operations, tracing control flow, patching minor defects, and providing structured secure-coding feedback to improve game stability.

title: Cybersoc Website Platform
description_short: The official web platform for Cybersoc, built for clarity, accessibility, and maintainability.
description_long: A long-term infrastructure project establishing the society’s official web presence. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, and JSON-driven content modules. The platform balances clarity and performance while acting as a real-world engineering environment for students to contribute features, fix bugs, improve UX, and learn through version-controlled collaboration.
